title: Remove all caller and principal authentication checks

requirements.text: Remove all caller and Principal-based authorization checks from backend/main.mo, making all public canister methods accessible without authentication verification

quotes: Can you remove all caller and principal checks now
remove all caller and principal checks from the backend code, making all canister methods publicly accessible without any authorization restrictions

acceptanceCriteria: All methods in backend/main.mo that previously checked msg.caller or used Principal-based authorization now execute without these checks
Methods like createChatroom, deleteMessage, pinMessage, and updateUserProfile are callable by any principal
No assertion failures or authorization errors occur when any principal calls backend methods
The application continues to function correctly without any caller-based restrictions

constraints: Preserve all existing functionality except authorization checks
Do not modify frontend code or any other backend files
Keep all data structures and method signatures intact
nonGoals: Reverting to version 314 (this is a separate concern)
